entries.terrified_10: It's going to kill us!! Help!!!
entries.terrified_9: Help!  Help!   We're going to be eaten!
entries.terrified_6: I haven't made out my will!
entries.terrified_5: Save us from this horrible creature!
entries.terrified_3: Oh dear, won't somebody save us?!?
entries.pirate_25: Never let them see you bleed!
entries.pirate_24: I've seen men killed for saying trite like that.
entries.pirate_23: I have cards and dice.  We could do some gambling.
entries.pirate_22: Is that Twi'lek cooking I smell?
entries.pirate_21: Captain says I'm the best first mate he's ever had.
entries.pirate_20: No one makes good eye-patches anymore.
entries.pirate_19: Have I shown you my scars?  Well, you wouldn't want to see them anyway.
entries.pirate_18: I did some time on Dathomir myself.  You don't believe me?!?
entries.pirate_17: Imperial prisons are by far the cleanest.
entries.pirate_16: Robbed a casino myself once.  Never again, never again...
entries.pirate_15: It's amazing how many people I know with a severed limb...
entries.pirate_14: They say Bith are the best musicians, but I think Max Rebo's my favorite.
entries.pirate_13: I used to work for Nym.  Nasty one, he is.
entries.pirate_12: I hear Calrissean run's a high stakes poker game somewhere near Bespin.
entries.pirate_11: I think that guy's wearing my chrono...
entries.pirate_10: Could I be any better looking?
entries.pirate_9: Corellian ships are the easiest to board...
entries.pirate_8: The Hutt's always pay on time, I'll give them that.
entries.pirate_7: Never steal from an Imperial supply ship.  They say Vader personally hunts down any pirate that does.
entries.pirate_6: It's like there's war going on, up there where the stars are.  You know, like a space battle.
entries.pirate_5: Arrr....I think I stubbed my toe.
entries.pirate_4: It's not robbery if they give you their money freely is it?  Har har!
entries.pirate_3: I've killed men for less than that.
entries.pirate_2: I hope our ship is repaired soon...
entries.pirate_1: I once rode through the Jundland wastes on a bantha with no name.
entries.townperson_25: I wonder if I'm supposed to be somewhere...
entries.townperson_24: Oh yes, she's a lovely girl.
entries.townperson_23: Just need enough credits for one more drink...
entries.townperson_21: I'd rather be eaten by Rancor's then pay that guy off.
entries.townperson_20: Have you ever seen the inside of an imperial prison?  Me neither.
entries.townperson_19: I have too much to do today.
entries.townperson_18: I've been considering moving to a new city.
entries.townperson_17: Well, this planet's not so bad.
entries.townperson_16: My advice is, never gamble with a Hutt.
entries.townperson_15: I think I might be getting sick.
entries.townperson_13: I need to use the fresher.
entries.townperson_12: I need a new book to read.
entries.townperson_9: I hear the alliance is looking for more pilots.
entries.townperson_7: I'm not clear on what I should be doing now.
entries.townperson_4: Nothing interesting ever happens around here.
entries.townperson_2: It looks like it's going to be a warm one today.
entries.townperson_1: Oh, I haven't paid my taxes...
